import React from 'react' export default function contactModify({ contact }) { const {name, lastName, age, phone, email, image, site, tags} = contact handleChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name] : e.target.value }) } handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post(`http://localhost:3006/contacts`, contact) .then(res => { console.log(res) }) } return (
) }
